message: Can I get the same extension for firefox?
author: Sathish

message:
Hello I installed it and I got the following errors

com.github.ulauncher.ulauncher-timer | 2018-09-03 10:52:44,674 | ERROR | websocket: error() | error from callback <bound method="" client.on_message="" of="" <ulauncher.api.client.client.client="" object="" at="" 0x7f81d97eb890="">>: on_message() takes exactly 3 arguments (2 given)

apg:~/ $ Traceback (most recent call last): [10:53:02]
File "/usr/lib/python2.7/site-packages/ulauncher/util/SimpleWebSocketServer.py", line 664, in serveforever
client._handleData()
File "/usr/lib/python2.7/site-packages/ulauncher/util/SimpleWebSocketServer.py", line 279, in _handleData
raise Exception("remote socket closed")
Exception: remote socket closed
2018-09-03 10:53:07,666 | ERROR | ulauncher.api.server.ExtensionRunner: _run_process() | Extension "com.github.ulauncher.ulauncher-timer" was terminated with code -15
author: ttot11

posts.message:
To all who noticed that extensions stopped working,

Please update python-websocket-client package (python2-websocket-client for some distros) to the latest version (0.51 or higher).

There was a bug in v0.49 and 0.50
posts.author: Aleksandr Gornostal
